thread.title: Book Early & Save Big with Bahia Principe Hotels & ResortsTravelandtourworld.com
thread.title_full: Book Early & Save Big with Bahia Principe Hotels & ResortsTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Book Early & Save Big with Bahia Principe Hotels & ResortsTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Book Early & Save Big with Bahia Principe Hotels & Resorts Published on : Thursday, September 3, 2015
Enjoy and experience Bahia Principe Hotels & Resorts throughout the Dominican Republic, Mexico and Jamaica while saving big with Early Booking Bonuses. Resort guests can save from 10% to as much as 33% off regular prices depending on the resort and travel dates if they book early. Your savings, your choice. Bahia Principe Hotels & Resorts is a premium resort division under one of the world’s leading travel companies Grupo Piñero based in Mallorca, Spain. Bahia Principe Hotels & Resorts features 18 fun-filled resorts in the Dominican Republic, Mexico and Jamaica.
“This is a wonderful opportunity for travelers to book now as these huge savings won’t last long,“ said Julio Perez, Executive Vice President of Bahía Principe Hotels & Resorts. “With these savings travelers can use the opportunity to upgrade to a higher level of room or package,” added Perez.
The early booking bonus (EBB) is valid for travel from January 2, 2016 to January 1, 2017 on any of its resorts in the Caribbean and Mexico. The early booking bonus expires October 31, 2015. Contact your travel agent or visit the Bahia Principe.
Bahia Principe Hotels & Resorts are well-known for their exceptionally high standard of service, cuisine, guest rooms and resort amenities and activities and have garnered many awards for its resorts, cuisine and service. Since 1995 when they opened their first resort, the Bahia Principe San Juan in the Dominican Republic, the brand has grown to 12 properties in that country, four resorts in Mexico and two in Jamaica. It will open a new 149-room Luxury Bahia Principe Samana resort on November 1, 2015.
Bahia Principe Hotels & Resorts offers vacationers options depending on their interest and budget. For the ultimate in luxury, the Luxury Bahia Principe Don Pablo Collection caters to the most sophisticated traveler with spacious, well-appointed suites to personalized butler service to unlimited dining options.
Bahia Principe Hotels & Resorts features properties geared towards families with activities to satisfy all ages as well as select Adult-only properties.
Source:- Bahia Principe Hotels & Resorts
